casebody.data:
YOUNG (Lindquist)
v.
YOUNG. No. 213A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Ronnie M. Mitchell, Harold Lee Boughman, Jr., Fayetteville, for Steven Paul Young. Dale S. Morrison, Charlotte, for Nona Young.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of May 2005 by Defendant-Intervenors to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
